title: Snow Day Syndra - splash art
body: Skin cost 1350 Rp and splash art is looking like this ?....I think that Syndra NEED better splash...Please Riot...

replies.body: The skin costs 1350 because it is all new VFX, models, sounds, etc. Splash art has nothing to do with skin pricing at all as it's only seen in loading screens and those shouldn't last long.
Yes...but i think that Syndra deserve better splash art...after Queen of diamonds...
Think that all you want. The splash has been added to the PBE and is unlikely to change, so get used to it or just don't get the skin.

> [{quoted}](name=TheCeeJay,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qjEfATlO,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-01T20:29:03.449+0000)
>
> Think that all you want. The splash has been added to the PBE and is unlikely to change, so get used to it or just don't get the skin.

They still can fix this face. Splash art is okay, but face is bad, agree it.
The face looks like it was drawn in 20 seconds. Absolutely no detail or effort put into it.

Look at the boot and her eyes, it's very clear that this is a WIP splash for Syndra.

I'm personally glad that they are taking the time to edit Bard and Gnar out of the loading screen splash for Syndra.
These are actually the final splash assets.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qjEfATlO,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-02T00:35:47.603+0000)
>
> These are actually the final splash assets.

You said Syndra is classic Syndra who only dressed for snow day. Then why isn't her eyes completely purple?

Not: I was noticed this dresssing for snow day thing when it came to PBE. I must be genius or something. <.<
I actually wish her eyes were glowing Light blue like her particles in the skin and not purple, the slight purple makes her look kinda sick or creepy. I'd pref that or normal white eyes.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qjEfATlO,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-02T00:35:47.603+0000)
>
> These are actually the final splash assets.
Katey, the splash is really well done except for the face. It just looks off

Are you joking KateyKhaos? Final splash assets? Do you know what does art mean? No. We can see. Please... You made grouped splash for "hight quality skins" again... It's not good idea, but just laziness... AND Syndra has very low quality splash. Poppy has better for her 520 rp skins. You can't explaint that. It's laziness. Riot is greedy for easy money.
I dunno, I think it looks fine if you zoom out to the level you'd see it at ingame.

As a player who likes/liked the art for new Katarina, new Fiora, Vic Sivir, and several other "controversial" splash arts.....this Syndra art is legit terrible. It's like a more dog-faced version of Sarah Michelle Gellar on a low-gravity planet where the sun is somehow an indirect light source.
I think it looks fine, for a shared splash.

I think she looks very good in this splash art.

I was not expecting a group splash for these, but I am not displeased. Snow day skins are usually more light hearted, and I think this one fits the bill. She's looking to be the best, most powerful snowball fighter there is.

I am super psyched to get this skin and spam her all day :D More than I already do which is a lot.
They should make her hair that bright in game , and the face could use some changes in splash

The neutrality of her expression is a little strange. She's typically glaring/looking down whenever her eyes/face is visible, so focusing on something off screen in a kind 'eh' way strikes me as odd.

I'd half-expected her to be throwing snowballs after Gnar for sport, really.
